title: How A Queen Was Made - Novel Updates
tags: Acting   Brother Complex   Devoted Love Interests   Doting Love Interests   Episodic   Handsome Male Lead   Hard-Working Protagonist   Lack of Common Sense   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Modern Day   Reincarnation   Straight Uke   System Administrator   Transmigration   Tsundere   Unrequited Love   World Hopping
author: 一竹de幽篁
description: As a man who had lived for 20 something years and had always considered himself as a straight man, he woke up one day and found himself possessed by a stupid and cute system. Moreover, it was a gong-shou cultivating system?! Let’s see how a shou with raised hackles evolves into a (pseudo) queen shou, incidentally with a story of a hidden loyal dog gong.>
